Welcome to the documentation of the F1TENTH project at AiMotionLab SZTAKI!¶

Introduction¶

This is the documentation for the F1TENTH project at AiMotionLab SZTAKI. The main purpose of this documentation is to give an overview of the project and to provide a guide for the users on how to set up and interact with the F1TENTH vehicle of the lab.
